bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions developing in the nape hollow below the hair line on the back of the head. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fei zao jia 肥皂莢 quotes Zhai xuan fang 摘玄方 : 頭耳諸瘡：眉癬、燕窩瘡。並用肥皂煅存性一錢，枯礬一分，研勻，香 油調，塗之 , “All sores affecting the head and ears: eyebrow xuan -illness, and swallow-nest sores . Use 1 qian of fei zao ( jia ) prepared with heat maintaining its nature, and one fen of ku fan . Grind evenly. Mix with xiang you , and apply externally”.
